h2. {{issue.summary}}
_{{issue.description}}_
{{#if(not(lookupIssues.isEmpty))}}
     h3. This Initiative is focused on the following:
     {{#lookupIssues}}
          * {{summary}} ^{{key}}^
          ** {{issueType.description}}
     {{/}}
{{/}}

{{#if(not(issue.issuelinks.isEmpty))}}
h2. Project Resources:
    * h3. DBI Systems
    {{#issue.issuelinks}}
          {{#if(equals(issue.issueType.name,"DBI System [DBICBP]"))}}
              **  {{issue.summary}} ^{{issue.key}}^
          {{/}}
    {{/}}
    * h3. External Systems
    {{#issue.issuelinks}}
          {{#if(equals(issue.issueType.name,"External System [DBICBP]"))}}
              **  {{issue.summary}} ^{{issue.key}}^
          {{/}}
     {{/}}
{{/}}
